description:
In this course you will learn how to manage Facebook in 10 minutes per day like a professional.

The course includes:

  • Content planning
  • Create a comprehensive plan
  • Posting Succesfully as a brand on Facebook
  • Interacting & participating on Facebook
  • Growing your audience
  • Getting most of Facebook ads
  • Time saving tips for using Facebook
  • LotÂ´s of related and valuable links

This course is made for you who wants to market you company with Facebook but hesitate because it take to much of your time - I give you the tools to manage Facebook in only 10 minutes per day.
title: Facebook in 10 minutes per day
